name: Milkmaid of the Milky Way
description: Milkmaid of the Milky Way is an award-winning point-and-click adventure game in rhyme that combines a gripping story with puzzles and exploration. What happens when a young milkmaid sees an alien craft in a fjord in 1920's Norway?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Built In
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 or newer Processor: Intel i5 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Medium Powered DirectX10 Card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
